headline.main: TRANSPORTATION DEPT. TO DELAY A SMOKING BAN FOR AIRLINERS

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The Federal Aviation Administration said today that the Government had decided against banning smoking on domestic airline flights at this time.
docs.snippet: LEAD: The Federal Aviation Administration said today that the Government had decided against banning smoking on domestic airline flights at this time.
